item.title: Swift Action by Gadwal SI Helps Bihar Man Recover Rs 8,000 Lost in ATM Within an Hour
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: In a commendable display of efficiency and public service, Sub-Inspector (SI) Kalyan Kumar of Gadwal Town Police recovered a lost sum of ₹8,000 within just one hour, earning praise from a grateful man from Bihar and the local community.
The incident occurred near the Registrar Office in Gadwal town, where a man named Vinod Khan, a native of Bihar, attempted to deposit ₹8,000 into an SBI ATM. However, unaware that the machine had rejected the transaction, he left the premises without con...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
